narrative:
This a focused inspection specifically addressing the direct non-compliant items identified during the previous
inspection.  No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. The two adult servals and the marmoset
included on the report for the June 18, 2014 inspection under 2.40 (b)(2) had been examined by a veterinarian and
treatment plans had been developed.
 
IInspection and exit interview conducted with licensee.
